statements: DELETE FROM artworks WHERE artist_id IN (SELECT artist_id FROM artists WHERE country = 'USA');

DELETE FROM artists WHERE nationality = 'French' AND birth_date < '1990-01-01';

DELETE FROM exhibitions WHERE exhibition_name = 'Summer Show';
DELETE FROM exhibition_artwork WHERE exhibition_id = 1 AND artwork_id = 5;

DELETE FROM artist_artwork WHERE artist_id = 1 AND artwork_id = 5;
